description: This is a PHP source file for a web page that enables users to add or manage Dynamic DNS configurations. It includes PHP includes for headers and footers, HTML markup for the form, embedded JavaScript for client-side validation and interaction, and PHP code snippets for populating form fields based on system configuration.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Dynamically adds a new Host Name input field and remove button to the form.

methods.name: add1
methods.description: Removes the specified Host Name input set from the form.
